conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through baffles to containers E, F, or G.
Baffles are labeled A, B, C, and D; containers are labeled E, F, and G.
Liquid flows from A and is directed towards container E.
Liquid flows from B and is directed towards container F.
Liquid flows from C and is directed towards container G.
Liquid flows from D and is directed towards container G.
Liquid from A flows into E.
Liquid from B flows into F.
Liquid from C flows into G.
Liquid from D flows into G.
Final answer: Liquid from A flows into E, B into F, C into G, D into G.
